Uses of Class
org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.meta.ClassMapping

  • Packages that use ClassMapping 
    Package Description
    org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.kernel
    OpenJPA-JDBC Runtime Kernel Runtime services for the JDBC OpenJPA implementation.
    org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.kernel.exps
    OpenJPA-JDBC Expression Tree
    org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.meta
    OpenJPA-JDBC ORM Metadata This package extends the standard persistence metadata with object-relational mapping information.
    org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.meta.strats
    OpenJPA-JDBC ORM Strategies Library of mapping strategies.
    org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.sql
    OpenJPA-JDBC SQL Abstraction Utilities for generating SQL.
    org.apache.openjpa.persistence.jdbc
    OpenJPA JPA-JDBC JDBC-specific extensions to OpenJPA JPA runtime.
